text: Hi, How are you doing this morning?
I am doing well.  You?
I'm doing great and am really looking forward to our chat!
Excellent.  Sounds good.
I was just thinking about all the kids going back to school and saw a story about places to drop off school supplies for kids in need
OK - what specifically were you thinking about?
I was thinking that there are children all around the world that are in need and one charity in particular called Save the Children
What about this charity.  Are you thinking of donating to it?
I am and I would also like to ask you to donate to it as well because of all the good work they do for children who usually have nowhere else to turn for help
What do you think I should donate?

I think you should donate $0.15 now which is half of your payment of more if you like.  Your donation will be directed deducted from you task payment and collected by the researchers and sent to Save the Children
OK that sounds reasonable.  I will agree to donate $0.15 then.
That is fantastic and here is a link if you want to know even more  URL
OK thanks.  I already checked it out and it seems pretty good.  Have a great day!
You too and Thanks again!!
You are very welcome.
I think it speak volumes about you as a person to be willing to give of yourself even if it is a small amount!
And you likewise to ask.  I really appreciate your willingness to go out on a limb.
I feel inspired! Have a good rest of your day!
You too.  Thanks.
